statements.select: select id, name, status, (select role from Role where id = 1) role from users
select id, name, status from users inner join (select t.* from (select role, permission from Role where id = 1) t

select DISTINCT cast(stra.codigo_unidade as varchar) + '_' + cast(rtrim(cu.cac_code) as varchar)+ '_' + cast(COALESCE(ca.channel_code,99) as varchar)+ '_' + cast(COALESCE(ca.subchannel_code, 99) as varchar) AS fds_code ,convert(VARCHAR(6),vp.referencia, 112) as reference ,cast(convert(VARCHAR(8),su.in_date, 112) as int) as survey_dt ,su.survey_id as survey_sk ,su.in_date as date_in ,su.sync_date as sync_date ,su.route_id as survey_route ,su.presale_route_id as survey_presale_route ,cu.cust_sk as cust_sk ,cu.cust_name as cust_name ,su.cust_id as cust_code ,ca.presale_route_code as cust_route ,ca.presale_route_code as cust_presale_route ,stra.codigo_unidade as unit_code ,cu.cac_code as cac_code ,cast(COALESCE(ca.channel_code, 99) as varchar) as channel_code ,cast(COALESCE(ca.subchannel_code, 99) as varchar) as subchannel_code ,ca.presale_route_code ,vp.faixainicial as range_ini ,vp.faixafinal as range_end ,vp.datainicial as valid_date_ini ,vp.datafinal as valid_date_end ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.id" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.status" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.descricao" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.codigoSegmento" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.peso" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.tipo" ,FDSVIGENTE."fds.conformidadePreco" ,FDSVIGENTE.id_fds_vigente from RED_800_39_T.dbo.t_survey su WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN RED_800_39_DW.dbo.t_dim_customers cu WITH (NOLOCK) ON cu.cust_code = su.cust_id INNER JOIN ine.cust_association ca WITH (NOLOCK) ON ca.cust_id = cu.cust_code AND ca.ref = LEFT(CONVERT(INT,CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), su.in_date, 112)), 6) INNER JOIN ine.estrutura_comercial_cliente stra WITH (NOLOCK) ON stra.codigo_rota = ca.presale_route_code INNER JOIN ine.periodovigenciapesquisa vp ON vp.unidade = stra.codigo_unidade and vp.situacao = 'A' and cast(convert(VARCHAR(6),vp.referencia, 112) as int) = :referenciaAsAnoMes INNER JOIN (select tablerank.* from ( SELECT DISTINCT row_number() OVER (PARTITION by unid.codigo_unidade, seg.cac_id, COALESCE(ch.channel_id,99), COALESCE(sch.subchannel_id, 99) ORDER BY unid.codigo_unidade, seg.cac_id, COALESCE(ch.channel_id,99), COALESCE(sch.subchannel_id, 99), fdsv."data" desc) AS rnum ,cast(unid.codigo_unidade as varchar) + '_' + cast(rtrim(seg.cac_id) as varchar)+ '_' + cast(COALESCE(ch.channel_id,99) as varchar)+ '_' + cast(COALESCE(sch.subchannel_id, 99) as varchar) AS fds_code ,fds.id as "fds.id" ,fds.status as "fds.status" ,fds.descricao as "fds.descricao" ,fds.dataInativacao as "fds.dataInativacao" ,seg.cac_id as "fds.codigoSegmento" ,fds.peso as "fds.peso" ,fds.tipo as "fds.tipo" ,fds.conformidade_preco as "fds.conformidadePreco" ,fdsv."data" as "dataVigencia" ,unid.codigo_unidade ,rtrim(seg.cac_id) as cac_id ,COALESCE(ch.channel_id,99) AS channel_id ,COALESCE(sch.subchannel_id, 99) AS subchannel_id ,fdsv.id as id_fds_vigente FROM cluster.fds fds WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN cluster.fds_unidade unid WITH (NOLOCK) ON unid.fds_id = fds.id LEFT JOIN cluster.fds_segmento seg WITH (NOLOCK) ON seg.fds_id = fds.id LEFT JOIN cluster.fds_canal ch WITH (NOLOCK) ON ch.fds_id = fds.id LEFT JOIN cluster.fds_subcanal sch WITH (NOLOCK) ON sch.fds_id = fds.id INNER JOIN cluster.fds_vigencia fdsv WITH (NOLOCK) ON fdsv.fds_id = fds.id WHERE fds.status = 'A' AND fds.tipo = :tiposFDS ) tablerank where tablerank.rnum = 1) FDSVIGENTE ON FDSVIGENTE.codigo_unidade = stra.codigo_unidade AND FDSVIGENTE.cac_id = cu.cac_code AND FDSVIGENTE.channel_id = COALESCE(ca.channel_code, 99) AND FDSVIGENTE.subchannel_id = COALESCE(ca.subchannel_code, 99) WHERE su.survey_status_id = 1 and cast(convert(varchar(6),su.in_date,112) as int) = :referenciaAsAnoMes and ca.ref = :referenciaAsAnoMes ORDER BY cu.cust_sk, su.survey_id
